trans-unit.source: Allows a particular channel to opt-in to providing correlation data and specify the conditions under which the data is provided, such as whether it is provided by default, optionally, on send, before send, or on receive.
Called by derived classes to initialize the object.
When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether the correlation data should be included in default generated correlation queries.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the correlation data should be included in default generated correlation queries; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether the correlation data is optional as part of a query.
If IsOptional returns `true`, a query that includes this data is considered to be an optional component in the correlation key calculation.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the correlation data is optional; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether the data is definitely known before any data is transmitted.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data is known before transmission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the correlation protocol that provides the correlation data.
The name of the correlation protocol that provides the correlation data.
When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataDescription"></xref> is available while receiving a message.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataDescription"></xref> is available while receiving a message; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, indicates whether the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataDescription"></xref> is available while sending a message.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataDescription"></xref> is available while sending a message; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
